goal: Build a minimal single-page todo web app with add/toggle/delete flows, local persistence, and tests.

user_notes: Prioritize clarity and reliability over visual polish.
Keep implementation simple and easy to review.

definition_of_done: User can add a habit with non-empty name.
User can mark a habit complete/incomplete.
Habits persist across refresh using local storage.
UI shows total habits and completed habits.
At least 4 automated tests exist for core behavior.
Project includes a README section with run and test commands.
